verses.verse: And it came to pass in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, because that Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, she is broken <S%H7665><s%> that was the gates <S%H1817><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>: she is turned <S%H5437><s%> unto me: I shall be replenished <S%H4390><s%>, now she is laid waste <S%H2717><s%>:

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, and will cause many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> against thee, as the sea <S%H3220><s%> causeth his waves <S%H1530><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%>.

And they shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, and break down <S%H2040><s%> her towers <S%H4026><s%>: I will also scrape <S%H5500><s%> her dust <S%H6083><s%> from her, and make <S%H5414><s%> her like the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock <S%H5553><s%>.

It shall be a place for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets <S%H2764><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>: and it shall become a spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
And her daughters <S%H1323><s%> which are in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be slain <S%H2026><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

¶ For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will bring <S%H935><s%> upon Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, a king <S%H4428><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>, from the north <S%H6828><s%>, with horses <S%H5483><s%>, and with chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and with horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and companies <S%H6951><s%>, and much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

He shall slay <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and he shall make <S%H5414><s%> a fort <S%H1785><s%> against thee, and cast <S%H8210><s%> a mount <S%H5550><s%> against thee, and lift up <S%H6965><s%> the buckler <S%H6793><s%> against thee.
And he shall set <S%H5414><s%> engines <S%H4239><s%> of war <S%H6904><s%> against thy walls <S%H2346><s%>, and with his axes <S%H2719><s%> he shall break down <S%H5422><s%> thy towers <S%H4026><s%>.

By reason of the abundance <S%H8229><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> their dust <S%H80><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee: thy walls <S%H2346><s%> shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and of the wheels <S%H1534><s%>, and of the chariots <S%H7393><s%>, when he shall enter <S%H935><s%> into thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, as men enter <S%H3996><s%> into a city <S%H5892><s%> wherein is made a breach <S%H1234><s%>.

With the hoofs <S%H6541><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> shall he tread down <S%H7429><s%> all thy streets <S%H2351><s%>: he shall slay <S%H2026><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and thy strong <S%H5797><s%> garrisons <S%H4676><s%> shall go down <S%H3381><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And they shall make a spoil <S%H7997><s%> of thy riches <S%H2428><s%>, and make a prey <S%H962><s%> of thy merchandise <S%H7404><s%>: and they shall break down <S%H2040><s%> thy walls <S%H2346><s%>, and destroy <S%H5422><s%> thy pleasant <S%H2532><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>: and they shall lay <S%H7760><s%> thy stones <S%H68><s%> and thy timber <S%H6086><s%> and thy dust <S%H6083><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%>.
And I will cause the noise <S%H1995><s%> of thy songs <S%H7892><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>; and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of thy harps <S%H3658><s%> shall be no more heard <S%H8085><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee like the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock <S%H5553><s%>: thou shalt be a place to spread <S%H4894><s%> nets <S%H2764><s%> upon <S%H4894><s%>; thou shalt be built <S%H1129><s%> no more: for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

¶ Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>; Shall not the isles <S%H339><s%> shake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of thy fall <S%H4658><s%>, when the wounded <S%H2491><s%> cry <S%H602><s%>, when the slaughter <S%H2027><s%> is made <S%H2026><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee?

Then all the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> from their thrones <S%H3678><s%>, and lay away <S%H5493><s%> their robes <S%H4598><s%>, and put off <S%H6584><s%> their broidered <S%H7553><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>: they shall clothe <S%H3847><s%> themselves with trembling <S%H2731><s%>; they shall sit <S%H3427><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%>, and shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> at every moment <S%H7281><s%>, and be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at thee.

And they shall take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> for thee, and say <S%H559><s%> to thee, How art thou destroyed <S%H6><s%>, that wast inhabited <S%H3427><s%> of seafaring men <S%H3220><s%>, the renowned <S%H1984><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, which wast strong <S%H2389><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, she and her inhabitants <S%H3427><s%>, which cause <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> to be on all that haunt <S%H3427><s%> it!

Now shall the isles <S%H339><s%> tremble <S%H2729><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy fall <S%H4658><s%>; yea, the isles <S%H339><s%> that are in the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be troubled <S%H926><s%> at thy departure <S%H3318><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> thee a desolate <S%H2717><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, like the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are not inhabited <S%H3427><s%>; when I shall bring up <S%H5927><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> upon thee, and great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee;

When I shall bring thee down <S%H3381><s%> with them that descend <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>, with the people <S%H5971><s%> of old time <S%H5769><s%>, and shall set <S%H3427><s%> thee in the low parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, in places desolate <S%H2723><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>, that thou be not inhabited <S%H3427><s%>; and I shall set <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H6643><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>;

I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee a terror <S%H1091><s%>, and thou shalt be no more: though thou be sought for <S%H1245><s%>, yet shalt thou never <S%H5769><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> again, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
